
                            
                            <p>扫脸前，提示存储权限没开通，我点同意后跳到了图二，点建行生活，跳到了图三，我又在应用管理里把建行生活的文件文档权限开通了，参考图四，还是没用，开通不了云网支付，重启也没用，建行生活到底怎么开通存储权限？app里问客服，因为开通不了存储权限，没法给客服发图 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123037eo7bwootvmwoo0mo.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123037eo7bwootvmwoo0mo.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123049mzley3yezoaya2zn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123049mzley3yezoaya2zn.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123114k2rqajfv85fc5j2c.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123114k2rqajfv85fc5j2c.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123312hh5bm2naztzay0mb.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/123312hh5bm2naztzay0mb.jpg"> <br> </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
